question: You would like to work for a company or organisation in a foreign country. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter:• Describe the kind of job you would like to do• Explain which country or part of the world you would like to work in• Tell them why you are interested in working in another country
text: I am writing this letter to express my desire to work  overseas and looking for  expert assistance to review my eligibility criteria for the job and with the visa process.

I have 10 years of experience as a software developer so I prefer working in a job role with responsibilities like collaboration with multiple teams, and designing & developing web applications for any foreign employer.

When comes to job location, I am inclined toward migrating to Canada as my profile has a significant amount of job opportunities in that market. In addition, I want to explore winter sports during the harsh winters.
This is  crucial to reuniting with my parents and siblings who are settled in Canada. Further, My family and I looking for a country with free education for my children and multi-facility hospitals.
I hope you provide me with extraordinary advice on foreign employment. I will be waiting for your response.
